title: Eclair. Episode 10
creator_credit: Alma Gray, David Ash, Pat McLagan and ILEA
brief_description: The series “Eclair” features Ted, a rather confused and naive Englishman and a pair of mischievous French adolescent twins. The theme in this film is: “Entertainment” including choosing where to go, when to go, where to meet and how to buy a ticket for a place of entertainment.
creator_credit_for_label: Alma Gray, David Ash, Pat McLagan and ILEA
